alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 1:39AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with gusty wind and heavy rain will impact portions of southwest Yavapai County through 215 AM MST... At 138 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Burro Creek Campground to near Peeples Valley to near Crown King. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Congress, Walnut Grove, Crown King, Wagoner, Yarnell, Peeples Valley, Turney Gulch Group Campground, Glen Ilah and Hazlett Hollow Campground. This includes the following highways... State Route 89 between mile markers 258 and 285. State Route 71 between mile markers 98 and 109. State Route 97 between mile markers 156 and 159. Highway 93 between mile markers 149 and 194. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
